text: Alexander Vladimirovich Rutskoi (; born 16 September 1947) is a Russian politician and a former Soviet military officer.Encarta Encyclopedia, "Encyclopedia Article: Aleksandr Rutskoy", 2008. Archived 31 October 2009. Rutskoy served as the only Vice President of Russia from 10 July 1991 to 4 October 1993, and as the Governor of Kursk Oblast from 1996 to 2000. In the Russian constitutional crisis of 1993, he was made acting President of Russia, in opposition to President Boris Yeltsin. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet military people Category:Vice presidents Category:Russian politicians Category:People from Kursk Oblast
title: Alexander Rutskoy
